content:
Diagnosis:		Stage IIA ovarian endometrioid carcinoma

Management:		Primary debulking surgery 15 Jan 2024
		Commenced adjuvant carboplatin/paclitaxel 12 Feb 2024

Histology:		Grade 2 endometrioid carcinoma
		PTEN mutation positive
		Stage pT2aN0M0

Current Situation:	Pre-cycle 4 carboplatin/paclitaxel

I reviewed [redacted name] today prior to cycle 4 of adjuvant chemotherapy. She has tolerated the first three cycles well with only grade 1 fatigue and mild peripheral neuropathy affecting fingertips. Blood results show stable parameters with hemoglobin 115 g/L, neutrophils 2.8, platelets 245. CA125 has normalized from initial 85 to current 12. No clinical evidence of disease progression.

Plan to proceed with cycle 4 today as scheduled. Will arrange CT chest/abdomen/pelvis after cycle 6 to confirm response. Follow-up appointment in 3 weeks for cycle 5.

status_updates.value: Stage IIA ovarian cancer responding well to adjuvant chemotherapy with normalizing tumor markers
grade 1 fatigue and mild peripheral neuropathy
proceeding with cycle 4 carboplatin/paclitaxel as scheduled
Follow-up appointment in 3 weeks for cycle 5
